title: I will create animated whiteboard explainer video ad

description.aboutThisGig: Hello If you want to create a professional WHITEBOARD EXPLAINER VIDEO AD and engage your audience, then you are at the right place. It is recommended to contact through inbox first then place order.
description.whatDoYouGet:
CUSTOM DRAWINGS
Will cost extra depending on drawing, so please make sure the price by coming in inbox to get quote.
 ​COLORING - Will cost extra depending on the project type and type of coloring. 
 ​Editing script  after placing the order will cost extra.
 IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTION, FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME.
 For Whiteboard Explainer Samples please follow the link:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCm-0NlyD3Lb9IIj_UPIvCtQ/videos

reviews.content: I would highly recommend this Wiser artist. He is very kind, quick to respond, and really wants your project to succeed! I would highly recommend getting a gig from him!
Communication was poor. Project was super late with no communication from seller until I reached out. The work overall was pretty good after a few edits
Gul071 is amazing. He is very talented and follows up amazingly. I will certainly refer and use his services again. Thank you for doing such an incredible job. I am beyond pleased and excited.
